title: The disproportionate effects of AI data centers on local communities – and what can be done about it
description: How AI’s power, water and carbon footprints have a disproportionate effect on local communities, and what can be done about it.
content: Part one of our Keep Calm and Count the Kilowatts series showed how AI prompts are only a small portion of a person's daily power use. Part two explored how AI’s power, water and carbon footprints st… [+7181 chars]
